thoughts.thought: It’s just pathetic to give up on something before you even give it a shot.

Programming today is a race between software engineers striving to build bigger and better idiot-proof programs, and the Universe trying to produce bigger and better idiots. So far, the Universe is winning.
Knowing you’re different is only the beginning. If you accept these differences you’ll be able to get past them and grow even closer.
The most disastrous thing that you can ever learn is your first programming language.
I am victim, muderer as well as detective. Yes, when I have bug in my code
Two things are infinite. One is universe and another is Javascript's Framework. But I am not sure about universe.
